raw_body:
KARUNADASA – B.W. – Husband of late Rosemary Perera,​ father of Ranika,​ father-in-law of Sampath Thushara. Remains will lie at ‘Mahawila Gardens’,​ No. 658/​77A,​ Baseline Road,​ Colombo 09 from 31st January (Wednesday) at 8 a.m. onwards. Cremation on (Thursday) 1st February at 5.30 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella.
007215
